name: DragonHeart: Fire & Steel
overview: Seven evil dragons rule the world of DRAGONHEART: FIRE & STEEL. Seven fire-breathing, razor-clawed, knight-devouring monsters. Seven beasts too savage for the movie If you can cut your way through hordes of medieval knights hellbent on your destruction... if you can master the moves... if you can take the heat... then it's time to face your fiery nightmare! In first or third person perspectives, in the wilderness or in the secret arena... get ready for maximum evil... medieval style!
